heading:
Inspections of existing buildings, structures, signs, service equipment and construction machinery and
equipment
text:
In addition to other required inspections, the commissioner may make or require inspections of existing buildings,
structures, signs, service equipment installations and construction machinery and equipment to ascertain compliance with the
provisions of this code and other laws that are enforced by the department. Such inspections may be made on behalf of the
department by officers and employees of the department and other city departments and governmental agencies; and by approved
agencies, special inspectors or other persons when the commissioner is satisfied as to their qualifications and reliability. The
commissioner may accept inspection and test reports from persons authorized by this code or by the commissioner to perform
such inspections. Such reports shall be filed with the department.
